name: AlphaGo
description: An AI developed by DeepMind to play the board game Go.

name: ChatGPT
description: An AI language model developed by OpenAI capable of generating human-like text.

name: IBM Watson
description: An AI developed by IBM known for its ability to answer questions posed in natural language.

name: Siri
description: A virtual assistant created by Apple that uses voice queries and a natural-language user interface.

name: Alexa
description: An AI assistant developed by Amazon, capable of voice interaction, music playback, and other tasks.
